about_the_game:
There are 12 music files in this package.
11 of them are original tracks with 1 variation bringing the total to 12.

Attention: The soundtrack doesn't include the music from the trailer(search for "Kevin McLead - on the Cool Side" on the web). Easter Overture from the credits roll and ending isn't included too.

Note: Do whatever you want with the files as long as your credit Evgeny Polyrush, the composer, and Femida the videogame. If you bought it here, you can even use it commercially as long as you credit the composer and the videogame. Don't resell it. As right now, this is the only place you can buy it.

legal_notice: Do whatever you want with the files as long as your credit Evgeny Polyrush, the composer, and Femida the videogame. If you bought it here, you can even use it commercially as long as you credit the composer and the videogame. A resale is not allowed.
name: Femida Soundtrack
short_description: The soundtrack of Femida composed by a Russian singer and music producer Evgeny Polyrush. 12 tracks in mp3 format you listen to when playing the game. It doesn't include the trailer theme and the music from the credit roll.
